title: Inside Realms
description: A fantasy short story collection exploring themes of love, loss, death and vengeance.Inside Realms is a compilation of nine short stories, telling the odd tales of wizards, magic, vampires, ghosts and deities. Come greet the Song Mages, the denizens of Camelot, the Vampire Order, The Undead, the Second World and various other characters.
author: A.F. Stewart
